resources.string: Already have an account? Log In
I have read through the privacy policy, terms and conditions to make a donation.

Welcome to Sanket ,an innovative Word-to-Sign and Sign-to-Word Converter App! We strive to bridge communication gaps by providing a user friendly platform that seamlessly translates spoken and written words into sign language and vice-versa. 

 Our mission is to empower individuals with hearing impairments and foster inclusivity by facilitating effective communication. We aim to make the world a more connected and inclusive place for every individual. 

 Join us in breaking down the barriers and embracing a world where communication knows no bounds.
